title: Person Create
description: How to create a person resource.

application/x-gedcomx-v1+xml.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<gx:gedcomx xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:person id="12345">
        <gx:attribution>
            <gx:changeMessage>wikipedia knows</gx:changeMessage>
        </gx:attribution>
        <gx:living>true</gx:living>
        <gx:gender type="http://gedcomx.org/Female"/>
        <gx:name type="http://gedcomx.org/BirthName" id="name-id">
            <gx:attribution>
                <gx:contributor resource="urn:name-attribution" resourceId="KNCV-RMZ"/>
            </gx:attribution>
            <gx:preferred>true</gx:preferred>
            <gx:nameForm>
                <gx:fullText>Anastasia Aleksandrova</gx:fullText>
                <gx:part type="http://gedcomx.org/Given" value="Anastasia"/>
                <gx:part type="http://gedcomx.org/Surname" value="Aleksandrova"/>
            </gx:nameForm>
            <gx:nameForm>
                <gx:fullText>????????? ????????????</gx:fullText>
                <gx:part type="http://gedcomx.org/Given" value="?????????"/>
                <gx:part type="http://gedcomx.org/Surname" value="????????????"/>
            </gx:nameForm>
        </gx:name>
        <gx:fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Birth" id="born">
            <gx:attribution>
                <gx:contributor resource="urn:fact-attribution" resourceId="RMQW-LPK"/>
            </gx:attribution>
            <gx:date>
                <gx:original>3 Apr 1836</gx:original>
                <gx:formal>+1836</gx:formal>
            </gx:date>
            <gx:place>
                <gx:original>Moscow, Russia</gx:original>
            </gx:place>
        </gx:fact>
        <gx:fact type="http://gedcomx.org/Adoption" id="adopted">
            <gx:attribution>
                <gx:contributor resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/users/agents/JNYR-KJP" resourceId="JNYR-KJP"/>
            </gx:attribution>
            <gx:date>
                <gx:original>13 Apr 1836</gx:original>
                <gx:formal>+1836-04-13</gx:formal>
            </gx:date>
            <gx:place>
                <gx:original>Moscow, Russia</gx:original>
            </gx:place>
        </gx:fact>
    </gx:person>
</gx:gedcomx>
